paragraph.taxonomicName: Agrostula truncatula (Parl.) P.M. Peterson, Romasch., Soreng & Sylvester

subSubSection.paragraph: ≡ Agrostis truncatula Parl., Fl. Ital. 1: 185. 1848 ≡ Neoschischkinia truncatula (Parl.) Valdes & H. Scholz, Willdenowia 36(2): 663. 2006. Type: Spain, Sierra de Guadarrama, Aug 1841, G. Reuter s.n. (lectotype, designated here : FI-016207 [image!]; isolectotypes, FI-016206 [image!], FI-012389 (Webb herbarium, left hand plant) [image!]).
